channel.title: UICHCC Computer Club | Technological Salon
channel.description: Recent content on UICHCC Computer Club | Technological Salon

item.title: Protect Your Information With VeraCrypt - By Minyong Li
item.description: COMING SOON SALON Topic: Protect Your Information With VeraCrypt Speaker: Minyong Li (a.k.a. Junde Yhi) (CST Year 3) Location: T8-306 (BNU-HKBU UIC) Time: 2018.11.18 19:00-20:00 Abstract: The modern cryptography and corresponding tools has been empowering virturally everyone in the world to effectively protect their digitally stored data by just several mouse clicks. In this talk I will introduce VeraCrypt, a strong, state-of-the-art encryption software, which is proved to be unbreakable as long as you have a safe password.

item.title: Speaking of Git VCS - By Zhong Junru
item.description: Topic: Speaking of Git VCS Speaker: Zhong Junru (Class of 2018 CST) Location: T8-305 (BNU-HKBU UIC) Time: N/A Speaking of Git VCS is a lecture for all students in BNU-HKBU United International College. The lecture introduce the basic usage of Git version control system and GitHub. Course Material

item.title: Knowledge is Power: Introduction to Information Security - By Junde Yhi
item.description: Topic: Knowledge is Power: Introduction to Information Security Speaker: Junde Yhi (CST Y3) Location: T29-106 (BNU-HKBU UIC) Time: 2017.11.28 This is a lecture given by Junde Yhi on the Computer Carnival of BNU-HKBU UIC on November 28, 2017, introducing concepts of information security. The provided .md file is a mdp file. You may use it to play the slides.
